sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Post.css"; import { formatISO9075 } from "date-fns"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export const Post = ({ _id, title, summary, cover, content, createdAt, author, }) => { return (

{title}

{summary}

{author ? author.username : "Loading..."}
{formatISO9075(new Date(createdAt))}
); };
